Comments.Message:
I still have this problem, on 1.3.5 version. 

File generated by 01simple.php, on windows, apache 2.0, PHP 5.2.2-dev

I have this problem with the latest version 1.6.6 when I activate setOffice2003Compatibility(true).

If I set setOffice2003Compatibility to false or if I remove the call to the method then it works.

Don't know if this is new to you, just wanted to mention it !
It is known, but setOffice2003Compatibility should not be used unless end users of your documents are using the 2003 compatibility pack.
